programme.title: Hannah Swensen Mysteries
programme.desc: Hannah and Chad flirt with their own paths to solve the same murder while working to clear a colleague who is implicated in the crime. Meanwhile, Delores gets her big break. Stars Alison Sweeney, Victor Webster and Barbara Niven.

programme.desc: Dorothy dreams she is a contestant on "Jeopardy!" but the game is fixed in favor of neighbor Charlie Dietz.

programme.desc: Reba is pressured to take sides in a legal battle between her boss and Brock.

programme.desc: Van and Cheyenne reconcile with Van's parents and Reba begins to feel competitive when Van's parents shower the baby with extravagant gifts.

programme.desc: When Frasier overhears his dad's new girlfriend make a date with another man, Martin accuses him of eavesdropping; Niles and Daphne attempt to book the premier nursery-artist in Seattle.

programme.desc: Niles is shocked when Maris, his ex-wife, re-enters his life; patients exasperate Frasier when he returns to private practice.

programme.desc: Niles is fingered as an accomplice when his ex-wife is arrested for the murder of her Latin lover.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Lilith's (Bebe Neuwirth) friend sets her up on a blind date with Frasier; Niles and Daphne urge Martin to get rid of his gun.

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Sam and Rebecca battle it out when Rebecca decides she wants to buy the bar from Sam with the money her father has given her; to keep control of the bar, Sam buys the bathrooms and the pool room.

programme.desc: Vera (Bernadette Birkett) gets a job at Melville's; Lilith plans to give Frasier sensual photographs for his birthday.

programme.desc: Sparks fly between a young woman and her ex-boyfriend when they work together to save her family's general store.

programme.desc: A single mom faces Christmas alone until a stranger crashes into her life and becomes an unexpected houseguest.

programme.title: Love on the Air

programme.title: Love Struck Caf√©
programme.desc: An aspiring architect gets the opportunity of a lifetime when she's chosen to develop her home town's lake into an entertainment complex. Unfortunately, to complete the project, she must convince a lifelong friend to leave her family's home.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Taylor opens a time capsule left by her late mother on her birthday. It contains a list of challenges that force her out of her comfort zone, giving her a chance at the possibility of love.

programme.title: Notes of Autumn
programme.desc: A classically trained pianist from the city and her best friend from the country swap homes to recharge their passions.

programme.title: It Was Always You
programme.desc: A woman's engagement plans get thrown into disarray when her fiance's free-spirited brother returns home.

programme.title: Hearts Down Under
programme.desc: A New York restaurant owner inherits a charming cafe in Lemon Myrtle Cove, Australia, where she starts to fall for the cafe's charismatic chef.

programme.title: To Barcelona, With Love
programme.desc: Erica, an American translator, secretly revises a novel set in Barcelona. Everything is fine until bookstore owner Nico invites the credited author, Anna, to the city for a book-signing. Stars Alison Sweeney, Ashley Williams.
